mapper.sql: A.FID, A.FCREATEUSERID, A.FCREATEDEPTID, A.FCREATETIME, A.FLASTUPDATEUSERID, A.FLASTUPDATEDEPTID, A.FLASTUPDATETIME, A.FBANK, A.FISDEFAULTACCOUNT, A.FCOUNTNAME, P.FCODE FBANKPROVINCEID, A.FBANKAREA, C.FCODE FBANKCITYID, A.FFINANCELINKMAN, A.FLINKMANMOBILE, A.FSUBBANKNAME, A.FBANKACCOUNT, A.FRELATION, A.FBELONGCUSTOM, A.FSTATUS, A.FACCOUNTNATURE, A.FACCOUNTUSE, A.FLINKMANPHONE,K.FCODE FBANKID, H.FCODE FSUBBANKNAMEID, A.FFINANCELINKMANID, A.FBANKPROVINCENAME, A.FBANKCITYNAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_CUST_ACCOUNT A LEFT JOIN T_CRM_ACCOUNTBANK K ON K.FID = A.FBANKID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_ACCOUNTBRANCH H ON H.FID = A.FSUBBANKNAMEID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_BANKCITY C ON C.FID = A.FBANKCITYID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_BANKPROVINCE P ON P.FID = A.FBANKPROVINCEID
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_CUST_ACCOUNT A LEFT JOIN T_CRM_ACCOUNTBANK K ON K.FID = A.FBANKID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_ACCOUNTBRANCH H ON H.FID = A.FSUBBANKNAMEID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_BANKCITY C ON C.FID = A.FBANKCITYID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_BANKPROVINCE P ON P.FID = A.FBANKPROVINCEID where A.FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into T_CUST_ACCOUNT (FID, FCREATEUSERID, FCREATEDEPTID, FCREATETIME, FLASTUPDATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATEDEPTID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FBANK, FISDEFAULTACCOUNT, FCOUNTNAME, FBANKPROVINCEID, FBANKAREA, FBANKCITYID, FFINANCELINKMAN, FLINKMANMOBILE, FSUBBANKNAME, FBANKACCOUNT, FRELATION, FBELONGCUSTOM, FSTATUS, FACCOUNTNATURE, FACCOUNTUSE, FLINKMANPHONE, FBANKID, FSUBBANKNAMEID, FFINANCELINKMANID, FBANKPROVINCENAME, FBANKCITYNAME) values (#{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcreatedeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flastupdatedeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fisdefaultaccount,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fcountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbankprovinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbankarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbankcityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ffinancelinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flinkmanmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsubbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbelongcustom,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{faccountnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faccountuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsubbanknameid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ffinancelinkmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fbankprovincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbankcityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update T_CUST_ACCOUNT
FID = #{record.fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCREATEUSERID = #{record.fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCREATEDEPTID = #{record.fcreatedeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCREATETIME = #{record.fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTUPDATEUSERID = #{record.flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTUPDATEDEPTID = #{record.flastupdatedeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTUPDATETIME = #{record.flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FBANK = #{record.fbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FISDEFAULTACCOUNT = #{record.fisdefaultaccount,jdbcType=CHAR},
FCOUNTNAME = #{record.fcountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBANKPROVINCEID = #{record.fbankprovinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBANKAREA = #{record.fbankarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBANKCITYID = #{record.fbankcityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FFINANCELINKMAN = #{record.ffinancelinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLINKMANMOBILE = #{record.flinkmanmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FSUBBANKNAME = #{record.fsubbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBANKACCOUNT = #{record.fbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRELATION = #{record.frelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBELONGCUSTOM = #{record.fbelongcustom,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FSTATUS = #{record.fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FACCOUNTNATURE = #{record.faccountnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACCOUNTUSE = #{record.faccountuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLINKMANPHONE = #{record.flinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBANKID = #{record.fbankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FSUBBANKNAMEID = #{record.fsubbanknameid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FFINANCELINKMANID = #{record.ffinancelinkmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FBANKPROVINCENAME = #{record.fbankprovincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBANKCITYNAME = #{record.fbankcityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update T_CUST_ACCOUNT set FID = #{record.fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCREATEUSERID = #{record.fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCREATEDEPTID = #{record.fcreatedeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCREATETIME = #{record.fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLASTUPDATEUSERID = #{record.flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATEDEPTID = #{record.flastupdatedeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{record.flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FBANK = #{record.fbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FISDEFAULTACCOUNT = #{record.fisdefaultaccount,jdbcType=CHAR}, FCOUNTNAME = #{record.fcountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKPROVINCEID = #{record.fbankprovinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKAREA = #{record.fbankarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKCITYID = #{record.fbankcityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFINANCELINKMAN = #{record.ffinancelinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANMOBILE = #{record.flinkmanmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSUBBANKNAME = #{record.fsubbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKACCOUNT = #{record.fbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRELATION = #{record.frelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBELONGCUSTOM = #{record.fbelongcustom,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FSTATUS = #{record.fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FACCOUNTNATURE = #{record.faccountnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACCOUNTUSE = #{record.faccountuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANPHONE = #{record.flinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKID = #{record.fbankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSUBBANKNAMEID = #{record.fsubbanknameid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFINANCELINKMANID = #{record.ffinancelinkmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FBANKPROVINCENAME = #{record.fbankprovincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKCITYNAME = #{record.fbankcityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

FCREATEUSERID = #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTUPDATEUSERID = #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

FCOUNTNAME = #{fcountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FRELATION = #{frelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBELONGCUSTOM = #{fbelongcustom,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

FBANKCITYNAME = #{fbankcityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_CUST_ACCOUNT set FCREATEUSERID = #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCREATEDEPTID = #{fcreatedeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLASTUPDATEUSERID = #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATEDEPTID = #{flastupdatedeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FBANK = #{fbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FISDEFAULTACCOUNT = #{fisdefaultaccount,jdbcType=CHAR}, FCOUNTNAME = #{fcountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKPROVINCEID = #{fbankprovinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKAREA = #{fbankarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKCITYID = #{fbankcityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFINANCELINKMAN = #{ffinancelinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANMOBILE = #{flinkmanmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSUBBANKNAME = #{fsubbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKACCOUNT = #{fbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRELATION = #{frelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBELONGCUSTOM = #{fbelongcustom,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FSTATUS = #{fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FACCOUNTNATURE = #{faccountnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACCOUNTUSE = #{faccountuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANPHONE = #{flinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKID = #{fbankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSUBBANKNAMEID = #{fsubbanknameid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFINANCELINKMANID = #{ffinancelinkmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FBANKPROVINCENAME = #{fbankprovincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBANKCITYNAME = #{fbankcityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
from T_CUST_ACCOUNT A LEFT JOIN T_CRM_ACCOUNTBANK K ON K.FID = A.FBANKID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_ACCOUNTBRANCH H ON H.FID = A.FSUBBANKNAMEID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_BANKCITY C ON C.FID = A.FBANKCITYID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_BANKPROVINCE P ON P.FID = A.FBANKPROVINCEID where A.fbelongcustom = #{fbelongcustom,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and A.FSTATUS in ('0','2')

select
,t_org_department.fstandardcode as fdeptidStandardcode from t_cust_custbasedata join T_CUST_ACCOUNT on T_CUST_ACCOUNT.fbelongcustom = t_cust_custbasedata.fid join t_org_department on t_org_department.fid = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.Fdeptid where T_CUST_ACCOUNT.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
